variant.note: The FINITE STRING Newsletter 1983 ACL Membership List
variant.bodyText: Following is a listing of the 1983 members of the Association for Computational Linguistics as of the time Issue 3-4 of the AJCL went into production. Personal members are listed first, ordered alphabetically by last name. Insti- tutional members follow, ordered alphabetically by country, province (for Canada), city, and then insti- tutional name; for the United States, the sorting is by ZIP-code. Wanted: Addresses for the members whose names appear at the end of the Personal Members listing. Information should be for- warded to the ACL Secretary- Treasuer.

variant.title: The FINITE STRING Newsletter 1983 ACL Membership List
variant.author: Membership List
variant.abstract: Following is a listing of the 1983 members of the Association for Computational Linguistics as of the time Issue 3-4 of the AJCL went into production. members are listed first, ordered alphabetically by last name. Institutional members follow, ordered alphabetically by country, province (for Canada), city, and then institutional name; for the United States, the sorting is by ZIP-code. Wanted: Addresses for the members whose names appear at the end of the Personal Members listing. Information should be for-
variant.note: warded to the ACL Secretary- Treasuer. Personal Members
